name: NSTokenFieldCellDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of NSTokenFieldCell objects to work with tokenized strings.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, displayStringForRepresentedObject: Any) -> String?
items.desc: Allows the delegate to provide a string to be displayed as a proxy for the represented object.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, styleForRepresentedObject: Any) -> NSTokenField.TokenStyle
items.desc: Allows the delegate to return the token style for editing the specified represented object.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, completionsForSubstring: String, indexOfToken: Int, indexOfSelectedItem: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>) -> [Any]
items.desc: Allows the delegate to provide an array of appropriate completions for the contents of the receiver.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, editingStringForRepresentedObject: Any) -> String?
items.desc: Allows the delegate to provide a string to be edited as a proxy for the represented object.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, representedObjectForEditing: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Allows the delegate to provide a represented object for the string being edited.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, shouldAdd: [Any], at: Int) -> [Any]
items.desc: Allows the delegate to validate the tokens to be added to the receiver at a given index.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, readFrom: NSPasteboard) -> [Any]?
items.desc: Allows the delegate to return an array of objects representing the data read from pboard.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, writeRepresentedObjects: [Any], to: NSPasteboard) -> Bool
items.desc: Allows the delegate the opportunity to write custom pasteboard types to the pasteboard for the represented objects in objects.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, hasMenuForRepresentedObject: Any) -> Bool
items.desc: Allows the delegate to specify whether the represented object provides a menu.

items.name: func tokenFieldCell(NSTokenFieldCell, menuForRepresentedObject: Any) -> NSMenu?
items.desc: Allows the delegate to provide a menu for the specified represented object.
